WHERE nc_title iLIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' OR nc_content iLIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
SELECT PREBNO FROM( SELECT nc_no, LAG(nc_no,1,-1) OVER(ORDER BY nc_no ASC) AS PREBNO, LEAD(nc_no,1,-1) OVER(ORDER BY nc_no ASC) AS NEXTBNO FROM bp_notification ) n WHERE n.nc_no=#{nc_no}
SELECT NEXTBNO FROM( SELECT nc_no, LAG(nc_no,1,-1) OVER(ORDER BY nc_no ASC) AS PREBNO, LEAD(nc_no,1,-1) OVER(ORDER BY nc_no ASC) AS NEXTBNO FROM bp_notification ) n WHERE n.nc_no=#{nc_no}
SELECT bp_file.file_no, bp_file.name, bp_file.nc_no, bp_file.fileName, bp_file.uploadedFileName, bp_file.fileSize, bp_file.contentType, bp_file.downlink FROM bp_file WHERE nc_no = #{nc_no}
